3.4.9 Profile structure values

manner

Type

Summary

The type of a profiling manner.

Signature

MLWORKS.Profile

Structure

MLWorks.Profile

Type

type manner

Description

The type of a profiling manner.

A profiling manner describes how the profiler should gather profiling data. To define a manner, use the function make_manner.

See also

make_manner, page 30
